title: 90. (Part 1) Money Triggers & Feeling Unworthy to Spend
description:
Hey sis!

In this episode, we are talking all about triggers around money, triggers around spending money, and feelings of unworthiness tied to spending money. If you feel icky about conversations about money but also know that you have desires and needs that can only be met by spending money and feel conflicted by your opposing beliefs, check out this episode!

The bundle is BACK! Click here to get 111 self-love & self-improvement courses at a 99% discount price of only $75.90. This is only going to be available for a limited time so snag it while you can! (or visit bit.ly/beatriceslink)

Business Inquiries?

IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
